INTRODUCING AEROCORDER 100 FLIGHT/COCKPIT DATA RECORDER AeroCorder 100 offers a rugged enclosure, small size, lower weight, and less power consumption than traditional FDRs in a modular and flexible architecture. The additional acquisition module converts the AeroCorder into a Data Acquisition and Crash Recorder System, making this ideal for FOQA and SMS data collection. Designed and spec’d for airborne operational commercial and military environments for fixed-wing and rotary aircraft. FIND OUT MORE >> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocorder-fdr-cdr?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTURZME16ZzFNMlZsTVRkbCIsInQiOiJ1S0szcEJxWXdZWmYyU1VKZ2VFTFkzMWdSS1VcL3Zhb1lEbkYyUXVpQnB3ZlkrNnNLSlZQRGtibmk5aWdXeDIxaFNxeE42aCtoQkU1M21KQnl2UUJYakE9PSJ9]]>
AFFORDABLE UPGRADES FOR YOUR MAKE OF PERSONAL AIRCRAFT Not sure what or how to upgrade? We have a variety of products and sizes to customize your panel to perfection. AeroNav touch GPS navigators, AeroVue Touch displays and our affordable lines of autopilots from the AeroCruze 230 touch to the AeroCruze 100 provide the latest features and configurations to fit every retrofit imaginable. Add the AeroFlight backup attitude indicator, AeroPoint engine data monitoring, and AeroPower USB outlets for maximum information in a minimal amount of space. CUSTOMER SUCCESS STORY: RENO AIR RACER JOE CORAGGIO Joe Coraggio grew up around airplanes, so it’s no surprise that his love of aviation includes racing! Builder, pilot, mentor and engineer, Joe upgraded the entire panel on his Lancair Legacy aircraft with BendixKing’s xVue Touch Integrated Flight Deck solution, winning Rookie of the Year at the 2019 Reno Air Races.
